extension.name: User - Sendy
extension.author: SourceCoast | www.sourcecoast.com
extension.description:
Sendy System Plugin
Sendy integration for Joomla.
Use this plugin to auto-subscribe users to a specified list on registration.

For more information, see:
  1. Sendy Documentation
  2. Sendy Integration Information
If you use our free Sendy Integration for Joomla extension, please post a rating and a review at the Joomla! Extensions Directory: Sendy JED Listing

field.name: list_id
field.label: Sendy List
field.description: Select the list ID that a user should be auto-subscribed to after they register on your site.
